mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from web_service
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from web_service
order by ${orderByClause}

select a.service_logo as serviceLogo, a.service_name as serviceName, a.service_price as servicePrice, a.service_checknum as serviceChecknum, a.service_hours_date as serviceHoursDate, a.service_scope as serviceScope, a.service_phone as servicePhone, a.service_linkman as serviceLinkman, a.service_abstract as serviceAbstract, a.service_info as serviceInfo, a.service_id as serviceId, b.item_name as serviceTypeName, c.item_name as serviceTwoTypeName, d.ent_name as entName from web_service a left join sys_dataitem b on a.service_type = b.item_id left join sys_dataitem c on a.service_two_type = c.item_id left join web_member_ent d on a.member_id = d.member_id where a.service_state = '1' and a.is_del = '1' and a.service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
